description:
10-speed drivetrains can also get massive gear range. This cassette is perfect for riders looking to convert their 2x10 drivertain to 1x. Slap this on your wheel and enjoy the simplicity of 1x.

  • Gearing is 11-46T
  • 6 sprockets on two alloy spider carriers
  • Largest sprocket is 7075 aluminum
  • Alloy lockring and spacers
  • Chain compatibility: 10-speed wide ratio
name: SunRace MX3 10 Speed 11-46T Cassette
